author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Foundation Building Materials Reports Quarterly Loss Per Share Of $0.02
text:
May 9, 2018 / 10:26 AM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Foundation Building Materials Reports Quarterly Loss Per Share Of $0.02 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Foundation Building Materials Inc: * QUARTERLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01
* ACTIVELY EXPLORING REFINANCING OF ITS $575.0 MILLION 8.25% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2021
* EXPECTS GENERATION OF CASH FLOW TO IMPROVE OVER THE NEXT COUPLE OF YEARS Source text: [ bit.ly/2I0pzjr ] Further company coverage:
